Package transaction

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Abstract Class Account extends it's methods to Checking, Saving, and Money Market Class.
    AccountDatabase
    AccountDatabase Class performs operations to keep database of Accounts in check.
    Checking
    Checking is an Account subclass that waives monthly fees if the account has direct deposit Checking Accounts have an annual interest rate of 0.05% and a monthly fee of $25 but is waived if the balance is $1,500.
    Date
    Date Class holds date that user account was created.
    MoneyMarket
    Money Market is an Account subclass that Cannot waive fees if the number of withdrawals exceed 6.
    Month
    Class designed to store the values associated with each month
    Profile
    Profile class holds the first and last name of an account holder.
    RunProject2
    RunProject2 class calls the Transaction Manager to run the project
    Saving
    Savings Account is an Account subclass that gives loyal customers a promotional interest rate of 0.35% Savings Accounts have a monthly fee of $5 and are waived if the account balance is greater than or equal to $300.00.
    TransactionManager
    Transaction Manager handles the user inputs and is responsible for the the outputs of the program.
